sentences.english: The thankful Pilgrims included the Indians in their harvest celebration.
sentences.chinese: 心存感激的新移民在庆丰收时也邀请了印第安人参加。

sentences.english: The first case is a 3 year-old female residing in Ninh Hoa District, Khanh Hoa Province.
sentences.chinese: 第一例是一名居住在庆和省宁和县的3岁女童。

sentences.english: People release sky lanterns to celebrate the Lantern Festival in Pingsi District, New Taipei City on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 民众上周六在新北市平溪区平溪国中施放天灯庆元宵。

sentences.english: The anniversary celebrations come at a pivotal moment for the United States and China.
sentences.chinese: 此次周年庆处在对于中国和美国来说都是关键的时期。

sentences.english: Two dogs and one Xiahe discord, let a have the performance opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 二狗与夏河一句不和，让庆之有了表现的机会。

sentences.english: This invention discloses a process for preparing a medicin "Qingxin oil" for curing pustuloderma.
sentences.chinese: 本发明为一种治疗脓疱疮用庆锌油的制条方法。

sentences.english: Year of the Rabbit gets Sydney hopping.
sentences.chinese: 海外华人迎新春，悉尼同胞庆兔年。

sentences.english: Celebrates the abundant harvest, the words reunion, is this holiday eternal subject.
sentences.chinese: 庆丰收，话团圆，是这个节日永恒的主题。

sentences.english: Dumplings are an indispensable food for northerners during their New Year's celebration.
sentences.chinese: 在庆新年期间，饺子是北方人必不可少的食物。

sentences.english: The National Geographic Society celebrates its 122nd anniversary on Jan. 27.
sentences.chinese: 1月27日，国家地理学会迎来了他122周年庆。

sentences.english: Celebrating Hongkong Return Motherland, Promoting Jingjiu Prosperity, Talking about Remote Sensing Application.
sentences.chinese: 庆香港回归，促京九繁荣，话遥感应用。

sentences.english: I am here tonight to wish your club a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 今晚恭贺贵俱乐部周年庆。

sentences.english: He was president of the club, but behind the scenes his wife told him what to do.
sentences.chinese: 他是俱乐部的主席，但事实上的他的庆是幕后指挥者。

sentences.english: NEW YORK (CNN/Money) - As it celebrates its 50th anniversary this year, it looks like Playboy has staying power.
sentences.chinese: 今年是花花公子五十周年庆，看起来公司仍充满活力。

sentences.english: The celebration of our company's semicentennial will be held on December 10th.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司的五十周年庆将于十二月十日举行。

sentences.english: Hing Tai Jun, English learning going?
sentences.chinese: 庆太君，英语学得怎么样了？
